channel.title: Npc Help
channel.description:
I am needing help in making my Npc's face certain direction (i.e.- North, South, East, West) For some reason they all face south. Is this normal? And can it be changed? How?
(I'm using a tScape source)

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @Absentnos Absentnos
item.description:
@Absentnos wrote:

Nah. Tried it. that only changes whether it is allowed to walk to the range coords.
Any other suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @Absentnos Absentnos
item.description:
@Absentnos wrote:

[quote=“Thrasher Alpha, post:4, topic:252815”]Ive looked through autospawn.cfg, there are many values… im pretty sure you know XY, so mess around with the other 3 big values, going by 400’s at a time. If it still doesnt work you can mess with the little values by 2’s.

And to that post, im sorry I get confused with that. I play a guitar :D[/quote]
I figured it would be similar to setting a global object just putting in -1,…etc
These are the only values i have to edit
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

Ive looked through autospawn.cfg, there are many values… im pretty sure you know XY, so mess around with the other 3 big values, going by 400’s at a time. If it still doesnt work you can mess with the little values by 2’s.

And to that post, im sorry I get confused with that. I play a guitar

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Thrasher Alpha, post:2, topic:252815”][quote author=Absentnos link=topic=333961.msg2601199#msg2601199 date=1230239288]
I am needing help in making my Npc’s face certain direction (i.e.- North, South, East, West)
For some reason they all face south. Is this normal?
And can it be changed? How?

(I’m using a tScape source)
[/quote]

It should be one of the chords, or an option, such as XYZ chords, maybe there is another chord for direction? Ill look into this.[/quote]They’re not chords, they’re coords as in coordinates.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“Absentnos, post:1, topic:252815”]I am needing help in making my Npc’s face certain direction (i.e.- North, South, East, West)
For some reason they all face south. Is this normal?
And can it be changed? How?

(I’m using a tScape source)[/quote]

It should be one of the chords, or an option, such as XYZ chords, maybe there is another chord for direction? Ill look into this.

Read full topic
